OK so...i don't know what to say.  It's been so long since i've touched this thing and i'm not sure what to do.  Last time i updated, i think people were fighting and getting spit on. That was a while ago.  So yeah, life is good.  Life is great actually.  Lots of things have happened in the past month or so: end of school, prom, beach week, graduation, grad night, grad party.  Maybe i'll post some pictures sometime cuz i have a bunch. I'll sum up each of those events in one sentence each.
   last day of school: Finally out of school after four years of bullshit but we lost to bowie and I cried.
   prom: Lots of fun dancing with my girl and the fellas too and just relaxing, and afterwards the hotel was fun especially cuz of the awesome beer in the coffee maker. (sorry tony, others)
   beach week: Weather could have been nicer but it was the best week of my life.
   graduation: James Brown gave a pretty good speech and Sly knocked off Zhen's cap which was embarassing.
   grad night: Amanda and I dominated at white boy jeopardy the whole night and i made 15 bucks.
   grad party: Lots of italians running around eating barbecue and meatballs, the nigs came over and played bball, and i was exhausted.

I watched the Exorcist tonight and it made me laugh more than it made me scared. I don't see how that's such a scary movie.

"Let's start a muthafuckin riot in this joint...I be ridin spinners, but you can't, cuz youre a fucking faggot!"--Beachweek '04

In other news, Aman is getting a job at a bank.  Now he won't have to sell crack anymore so thats good.  Not that theres anything wrong with that.  A black man working at a bank...next thing you know they'll be running for president. O wait...

I promise we'll update some more. at least Aman will. maybe
          
 peaceeeee

Except they have to rip our power cable out and hide it with a little help from gay spanky. Now i'm a little pissed off. I finally get it back but the stereo is gone. Now i'm mad...not too many people can get me mad, especially people that i don't give a shit about. I get the stereo back and put it down stairs so i could listen to my Jim Morrison in peace when they left. Finally, the Backstreet Boys left, so i run downstairs to grab the cd. It's gone.
